t:type.name: PairingCompletionStep
t:type.t:description: Steps for a user to follow after they have quit pairing. Clients should ignore actions they don't recognize.

t:attribute.name: id
t:attribute.description: The ID of the step, used for looking up images, eg 'customization/name'.

t:attribute.name: order
t:attribute.description: The order this step occurs in.

t:attribute.name: action
t:attribute.description: An action describing the layout of the screen to show

t:attribute.name: title
t:attribute.description: An optional title. Generally displayed in bold between the image and the contents.

t:attribute.name: info
t:attribute.description: An optional info message. Generally displayed in bold between the image and the contents.

t:attribute.name: description
t:attribute.description: A list of instructions to display describing the step. There will always be at least one entry. Generally each entry is displayed as a paragraph.
